name: Morkhërr
description:
---CONTROLS---

  • WASD / ZQSD  : Moving 
  • SPACE : Simple Attack
  • C :  Say evil things ! ( or not :p ) 
  • 1/& : Heavy attack spell
  • 2/é : Grab spell
  • 3/" : Armor spell
  • 4/' : 1V1 spell
    You can play with a gamepad ! check control in game ! If you had some trouble with your pad try with a remote one ( cable can do bug on Grab and 1V1 spell ! )

90% of Sound FX are homemade again xD ! And this time for the first time the music is also homemade ! :D

---How to play---

For once you play the final boss ! And not a basic hero ! Be worthy !

You must defend your dungeon and your treasures against a band of adventurers seeking glory ! 
The ennemies arrives in waves of increasingly  strong and numerous ! 
Don't get overwhelmed, use your spell wisely ! 
You are an evil lord after all !
